name: Jesper Cockx
content: Jesper Cockx - About me About me Hi! I'm an assistant professor at the programming languages group at TU Delft. I do research on the theory and implementation of dependently typed languages, specifically Agda. I'm also one of the main contributors to the implementation of Agda. Latest blog posts (see all) Reflective journaling prompts - September 15, 2024 On erasure annotations and agda2hs - July 30, 2024 Functional Programming in the Netherlands - July 17, 2024 Contact details Work email J.G.H.Cockx@tudelft.nl Private email jesper@sikanda.be Office 3.E.340, building 28 Work address PL / ST / EEMCS , Delft University of Technology , Van Mourik Broekmanweg 6 , 2628 XE Delft , The Netherlands Github jespercockx Mastodon @agdakx@types.pl
